comments:
build i0324:0800, winxp, sunjdk1.4.2

I started up a runtime workbench on an old workspace for the first time with the
new build. I got the following exceptions in my console. Workbench seemed to
start ok. It showed the intro page and then went to the workbench when I clicked
on the appropriate link.

You must have the latest and greatest org.eclipse.osgi from HEAD.  Pascal just 
released it two seconds ago.  when run in combination with pde.core from 
today's I-build, you will get this error as he changed some signature to fix 
the plugin converter issue.  

Two options for you:
1. I will release the fix into HEAD in the next little while.  In which case, 
you would have to check out pde.core from cvs to be able to run a runtime 
workbench.

2. Use the org.eclipse.osgi version that went into the I-build.

Note that by WONTFIX, it does not mean that I won't fix the compilation error 
for the next build :-)
Yep, that's it. I'll load pde-code from HEAD in a few minutes. Thanks.
Now you're just rushing me ;-)  I'll alert you when it is safe to do so.
DJ, you could check out pde.core from CVS now.
